Title: Three essential health factors
Publisher: World Health Organization (世界卫生组织), PRC Ministry of Health (中华人民共和国卫生部), Beijing Food Safety Committee (北京市食品安全委员会)
Notes: The three essential health factors referred to are food safety, healthy food, and exercise. The poster was published by the World Health Organization, the PRC Ministry of Health, and the Beijing Food Safety Committee.
